name: Tomato vs Pear (open source turn-based battle)
name_original: Tomato vs Pear (open source turn-based battle)
description:
This a simple turn-based battle game inspired by the real life battles between tomatoes and pears taking place in any ordinary kitchen every day. It was made as an example of how to put together a classic pokemon-y turn-based battle system in GDevelop IDE. So, it is open source.
  • Game made in GDevelop
  • Sounds made in Bfxr and edited with Audacity
  • Cheesy horrible music made in the awesome LMMS by someone who don't know how to compose cool music (me)
  • Food vector created by freepik - www.freepik.com
  • "A Aha Wow" font downloaded from www.dafont.com/a-aha-wow.font
